0xA47B860F.name: GET_PED_EYE_COLOR
0xA47B860F.description: A getter for [\_SET_PED_EYE_COLOR](#\_0x50B56988B170AFDF). Returns -1 if fails to get.

examples.code:
local pedEyeColour = GetPedEyeColor(PlayerPedId())
if pedEyeColour == 7 then
  print("Gray eyes!")
end

0xA47B860F.resultsDescription: Returns ped's eye colour, or -1 if fails to get.
